entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
